title: Project Planning and Management
description: Establish project goals, scope, timeline, and resource allocation. Define project management processes and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct research on natural photosynthesis processes and existing carbon capture technologies. Gather requirements from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for CO2 absorption, energy conversion, and storage. Define interfaces, data flow, and communication protocols. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security aspects, and environmental impact. Propose a modular and extensible design to accommodate future enhancements and integration with other systems.

title: Prototype Development
description: Build a functional prototype of the BionicTreeCarbonCapture system for proof of concept and testing.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Assess security risks and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards for carbon capture and storage technologies.
